item.title: 美国 2 月份工厂订单稳健增长
item.description: 美国制成品的新订单在 2 月份稳健增长，这很可能是因为企业在关税之前提前下达了订单。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods increased solidly in February, likely as businesses front-loaded orders ahead of tariffs.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回美国食品及药物管理局（FDA）否决香精产品的裁决
item.description: 美国最高法院周三驳回了一项司法裁决，该裁决认定美国食品和药物管理局拒绝两家电子烟公司销售监管机构认为会对青少年健康造成危害的调味电子烟产品的行为是非法的。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court threw out on Wednesday a judicial decision that found the U.S. Food and Drug Administration acted unlawfully in refusing to let two e-cigarette companies sell flavored vape products that regulators consider a health risk to youths.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司高管称新发现 "意义重大
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）勘探与生产主管西尔维娅-多斯安若斯（Sylvia dos Anjos）周三表示，该公司今年在坎波斯盆地、桑托斯盆地和布齐奥斯油田的发现 "意义重大"。【原文：Discoveries made by Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras discoveries this year in the Campos and Santos basins and in the Buzios field are "significant," exploration and production head Sylvia dos Anjos said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回医用大麻公司避免勒索诉讼的请求
item.description: 一名商用卡车司机因服用大麻二酚（或称 CBD）后药检不合格而被解雇，他说有人谎称 CBD 不含大麻中的精神活性成分，美国最高法院周三裁定医用大麻公司败诉。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday against Medical Marijuana Inc in its bid to fend off a lawsuit by a commercial truck driver who was fired for failing a drug test after taking cannabidiol, or CBD, that he said was falsely sold as lacking the psychoactive ingredient present in marijuana.】

item.title: 西班牙里奥哈的葡萄酒酿造商对美国关税忧心忡忡，酒窖里满是葡萄酒
item.description: 自大流行病发生以来，西班牙里奥哈产区的葡萄酒库存量不断增加，但在唐纳德-特朗普总统所谓的 "解放日 "关税宣布之前，生产商将单宁酸含量高的红葡萄酒销往美国市场的希望变得渺茫。【原文：Stockpiles of wine in Spain's Rioja region have swelled since the pandemic, but producers' hopes of offloading tannic reds into the U.S. market were dimming ahead of what President Donald Trump is calling his "liberation day" tariffs announcement.】

item.title: Netflix 加强电视语言选择，吸引全球观众
item.description: Netflix 周三为电视观众推出了增强型语言选项，允许用户从所有可用字幕和配音语言列表中选择任何字幕和配音语言。【原文：Netflix on Wednesday rolled out enhanced language options for television viewers, allowing users to select from the full list of available subtitles and dubbing languages for any title.】

item.title: 顾问反驳特朗普提高国内矿产品产量的计划
item.description: 美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）的一位知名顾问正在反击唐纳德-特朗普总统利用该公司促进国内矿产生产投资的计划。【原文：A well-known adviser to the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC) is pushing back against a plan by President Donald Trump to use it to boost domestic investment in mineral production.】

item.title: 西甲通过全球推广引领人工智能发展
item.description: 在西班牙，人工智能已经成为球队的一部分。【原文：Artificial intelligence isn't coming for football — in Spain, it's already laced up and part of the squad.】

item.title: 研究发现，巴西大豆种子盗版每年造成 17.6 亿美元的损失
item.description: 巴西作物生命协会（CropLife Brasil）和农业综合企业咨询公司 Celeres Consultoria 周三发布的一项研究显示，巴西大豆种子盗版每年给该国造成 100 亿雷亚尔（约合 17.6 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Soybean seed piracy in Brazil generates losses of 10 billion reais ($1.76 billion) per year in the country, according to a study by CropLife Brasil and agribusiness consultancy Celeres Consultoria released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国 BDI 游说集团敦促德国企业坚持多元化原则
item.description: 在美国表示其大使馆正在努力确保承包商遵守美国的多元化、公平和包容（DEI）计划之后，德国的 BDI 行业游说团体敦促企业在其德国业务中坚持自己的原则。【原文：Germany's BDI industry lobby group urged firms to stick to their principles at their German operations after the U.S. said its embassies were trying to ensure contractors comply with U.S. Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) programmes.】

item.title: Meta 与终极格斗锦标赛签订多年合作协议
item.description: Meta Platforms 与终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）签订了一份多年协议，成为其首个 "官方粉丝技术合作伙伴"。【原文：Meta Platforms has signed a multi-year deal to become the first "official fan technology partner" of Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC), whose CEO was elected to the Facebook-parent's board in January.】

item.title: 俄罗斯央行警告美国加征关税可能放缓全球经济增长
item.description: 俄罗斯央行周三表示，美国加征关税可能会减缓世界经济增长并加剧通货膨胀，由于全球需求减少，石油价格可能在几年内低于预期。【原文：U.S. tariff hikes may slow down world economic growth and fuel inflation, and oil prices could be lower than forecast for several years as a result of reduced global demand, the Russian central bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国经销商处的关税前汽车是防止价格上涨的缓冲器
item.description: 经销商手中有大量汽车的汽车制造商在磨合战略以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）25% 的关税时具有时间优势，而丰田的库存不足可能迫使其更快地提高客户价格。【原文：Automakers with plenty of cars on dealer lots have a time advantage as they hone their strategies for passing on President Donald Trump's 25% tariffs, while Toyota's lean inventories could force it to hike customer prices sooner.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，真理传媒申请允许特朗普的信托基金出售股票
item.description: 据 Axios 报道，特朗普媒体与科技集团周三向美国证券交易委员会提交文件，允许唐纳德-特朗普总统的信托基金出售价值 23 亿美元的股票。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group filed papers with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Wednesday that would allow President Donald Trump's trust to sell stock that could be worth $2.3 billion, Axios reported.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，中国企业向 Nvidia 下了 160 亿美元的新芯片订单
item.description: 据《信息时报》周三援引两位直接知情人士的话报道，今年前三个月，包括字节跳动、阿里巴巴集团和腾讯控股在内的中国公司已向Nvidia的H20服务器芯片下了至少160亿美元的订单。【原文：Chinese companies including ByteDance, Alibaba Group and Tencent Holdings have placed at least $16 billion in orders for Nvidia's H20 server chips in the first three months of the year, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing two people with direct knowledge of the transactions.】

item.title: 摩根大通表示，超过三分之一的新兴市场企业将受到关税的 "重大影响
item.description: 据投资银行摩根大通（JPMorgan）的分析师估计，一旦美国征收贸易关税，超过三分之一的新兴市场公司可能会受到 "有意义的 "影响。【原文：More than a third of emerging market companies are likely to be "meaningfully" impacted by U.S. trade tariffs when they hit, analysts at investment bank JPMorgan have estimated.】

item.title: 代理顾问 ISS 建议辉瑞股东否决高管薪酬提案
item.description: 由于首席执行官阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）和其他高管的长期奖励发生了变化，机构股东服务公司建议辉瑞投资者否决一项有关高管薪酬的提案。【原文：Institutional Shareholder Services has recommended Pfizer investors reject a proposal on executive compensation due to changes made in the long-term awards for CEO Albert Bourla and other top executives.】

item.title: LME 第一季度成交量猛增 5.9%，为 11 年来第二高
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（LME）周三表示，2025 年第一季度的日均交易量增长了 5.9%，创下了过去 11 年来第二高的季度水平。【原文：The London Metal Exchange (LME) average daily volumes gained 5.9% in the first quarter of 2025, marking the second highest quarterly levels in the last 11 years, the exchange said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+将在周四会议上讨论哈萨克斯坦产量问题
item.description: 两名代表告诉路透社记者，欧佩克+国家周四举行的八国会议将重点讨论如何说服哈萨克斯坦停止超过其产量配额，以及在该集团逐步提高产量的同时补偿产量过剩的计划。【原文：Eight OPEC+ countries meeting on Thursday will focus debates on how to convince Kazakhstan to stop exceeding its output quota and its plans to compensate for overproduction as the group steps up gradual production hikes, two delegates told Reuters.】

item.title: 普京允许亚美尼亚基金购买高盛持有的俄罗斯上市公司股份
item.description: 根据周三公布的一项法令，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京已授权亚美尼亚投资基金 Balchug Capital 收购高盛俄罗斯子公司 [RIC:RIC:GSGSC.UL] 所拥有的九家主要公司的股份，其中大部分是俄罗斯能源行业的公司。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has authorised Armenian investment fund Balchug Capital to buy shares owned by Goldman Sachs' Russian subsidiary [RIC:RIC:GSGSC.UL] in nine major companies, mostly in Russia's energy sector, according to a decree published on Wednesday.】

item.title: PIMCO 表示对美元的看法变得更加谨慎
item.description: 这家债券巨头的集团首席投资官丹尼尔-伊瓦辛（Daniel Ivascyn）周三表示，PIMCO对美元的态度变得 "更加谨慎了一些"，在所有投资组合中略微低配了美元。【原文：PIMCO has turned a "little bit more cautious" on the dollar and was a touch underweight the U.S. currency across portfolios, the bond giant's group chief investment officer Daniel Ivascyn said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称康菲石油公司有意出售俄克拉荷马州价值超过 10 亿美元的资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，康菲石油公司正在探索出售其去年斥资 225 亿美元收购马拉松石油公司时继承的俄克拉荷马州的石油和天然气资产。【原文：ConocoPhillips is exploring the sale of oil and gas assets in Oklahoma that it inherited from its $22.5 billion takeover of Marathon Oil last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Rivian 报告第一季度交付量下降
item.description: Rivian 周三报告称，第一季度交付量下降，因为这家电动汽车制造商正努力应对零部件短缺和需求疲软的问题。【原文：Rivian reported a fall in first-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as the electric vehicle maker grapples with part shortages and soft demand.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦称发现 2,000 万吨稀土金属矿藏
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦工业和建设部周三发表声明称，地质学家在 300 米深处发现了一个稀土金属矿藏，估计资源量超过 2000 万吨。【原文：Kazakh geologists have discovered a rare earth metal deposit with estimated resources of more than 20 million metric tons at a depth of up to 300 metres, the country's industry and construction ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份私营部门薪资增长加速
item.description: 周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，3月份美国私营企业薪资增长加速。【原文：U.S. private payrolls growth accelerated in March, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 解放日 "关税迫在眉睫，美国企业将面临更多痛苦
item.description: 世界各地的企业都在密切关注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对贸易伙伴全面征收新的互惠关税的细节，这是他今年早些时候重返白宫以来征收的一系列广泛关税中的最新一项。【原文：Businesses around the world are keenly watching for details on U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping new reciprocal tariffs on trading partners, the latest in a series of extensive duties imposed since his return to the White House earlier this year.】

item.title: 由于网络安全服务需求疲软，黑莓预计全年收入将下降
item.description: 加拿大黑莓公司（BlackBerry）周三预测，由于预计网络安全产品支出疲软，该公司2026财年的收入将出现下降。【原文：Canada's BlackBerry forecast a revenue decline in fiscal 2026 on Wednesday, as it anticipated weak spending on its cybersecurity products.】

item.title: 美联航根据长途旅行需求增加太平洋航班
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周三表示，该公司将增加飞往泰国和越南等太平洋地区目的地的航班，尽管国内需求放缓，但长途旅行仍是美国航空公司的一个亮点。【原文：United Airlines said on Wednesday it will add flights to Pacific destinations like Thailand and Vietnam, as long-haul travel remains a bright spot for U.S. carriers despite slowing domestic demand.】

item.title: 意大利梅洛尼表示美国关税将严重打击意大利生产商
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）周三在罗马表示，美国征收新关税将对意大利生产商造成沉重打击，并补充说应尽一切努力避免贸易战。【原文：The introduction of new U.S. tariffs would hit Italian producers hard, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said in Rome on Wednesday, adding that every effort should be made to avoid a trade war.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度无视汽车游说集团，支持在特朗普贸易协定中削减电动汽车关税
item.description: 印度政府和行业消息人士告诉路透社，印度计划降低电动汽车的进口关税，拒绝了当地汽车制造商提出的将关税下调时间推迟四年的要求，因为新德里优先考虑与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：India plans to lower import tariffs on electric cars, rejecting requests from local automakers to delay such cuts by four years, as New Delhi prioritises closing a trade deal with the United States, government and industry sources told Reuters.】
